alert.note: Alert for Custer; Fall River (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 2:29AM MDT until June 27 at 2:45AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL CUSTER AND NORTH CENTRAL FALL RIVER COUNTIES... At 228 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cold Brook Reservoir, or 4 miles northwest of Hot Springs, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hot Springs, Pringle, Wind Cave National Park, Cottonwood Springs Dam, Maverick Junction, Cold Brook Reservoir and southern Custer State Park. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
